website_summaries.verdict: This warmer heats wipes above body temperature, and is treated with an anti-microbial product to keep your wipes safe and clean.
pros: Heats wipes at 99 to 101 degrees Fahrenheit
Treated with an anti-microbial additive to inhibit bacteria growth
Ever-fresh pillow system keeps wipes moist and helps prevent browning
Takes up to three hours to reach full temperature
cons: Lid may not stay closed, which can lead to wipes drying out

customer_reviews.title: Brown mold or something all over wipes
customer_reviews.text: I've had this wipe warmer for not even 2 weeks and it left the wipes with all this brown stuff on them, mold maybe? It's also very loud opening and closing the lid. Definitely returning this item
customer_reviews.author: Arielle

customer_reviews.title: Gets way too hot. Burns liner.
customer_reviews.text: This dispenser gets way too hot! I purchased the pads that you wet and place below the wipes and it dries out and burns to the inside of the dispenser within a week. It's recommended you rewet it with every wipe refill and change pads out every three months but the pads burn. I'm afraid this may cause a fire. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Vesely

customer_reviews.title: Works with Water Wipes
customer_reviews.text: This wipe warmer works for water wipes. I was skeptical to get this after I had a previous model of prince lion heart before and it did not work. It kept leaking water out and eventually, had to toss it. After trying several other wipe warmers that didn’t allow water wipes to be warm, I decided to try this model and so far, it’s working well. No leakage and it’s keeping the water wipes warm- warm but not too warm to where they dry out. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian Cabezas

customer_reviews.title: Don’t recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Do not purchase. Fire hazard maybe? I followed all directions (which were very simple) and the sponge at the bottom which you’re suppose to saturate with water PRIOR to first use. 2 weeks later, the sponge at the bottom is ROCK HARD and stuck to the bottom! It’s suppose to stay moist or just dry up but this was rock hard and stuck. Is it suppose to get this hard? Product didn’t overheat, but why is it like this?!?
customer_reviews.author: NJ Mommy

customer_reviews.title: Well worth it!!
customer_reviews.text: I know some families think heated baby wipes are a waste of money, but for our daughter this was a huge life saver. As a newborn, cold wipes would make her scream. We eventually moved her changing table into a bathroom and used hot clothes. Worked amazing! Once she was a few weeks older, we set up a changing table near her bed with wipes in this heater. They work great and take he cold edge off. When you’re changing your child in the night, especially if you live in a cold state, this can be a huge game changer for you!!
customer_reviews.author: oanie

customer_reviews.title: Great for cloth wipes
customer_reviews.text: We use this for cloth wipes. I don't feed the wipes through the hole, but just open the main compartment to get them out. I stack the wipes in there with solution made from Dr Bronners, coconut oil and distilled water. This keeps them just the right temperature, and my daughter will smile and sometimes giggle when I use these warmed wipes. My first Prince Lionheart wipes warmer lasted two and a half years. I think that's pretty great for 24/7 use. I rebought the same one and now I'm using it for my second kid.
customer_reviews.author: SFisher

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: My wife insisted on having a warmer for the wipes and I have no idea why, however this item works great. You add a little water to the sponge at the bottom and it keeps the wipes warm and reduces the cold jarring wipe for your newborn. Only issue I have is that when you put a brand new pack into it there is difficulty to remove the next few wipes, needed to be 1/8" taller.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Works very well.
customer_reviews.text: This wipe warmer works at getting the wipes warm and keeping warm for use. I previous bought a different brand, which I had to return back because it only keep the wipes warm for 3 seconds. This one stays warm until I wipe my baby. I also notice some brands of wipes stays warmer then others. First problem I have with warmer is that I wish it had on/off button for when leaving house for long trips. You have to unplug it to turn off. My second is the bright green light, which stays bright even when dimmed. I had to put black electrical tape over that bright green light.
customer_reviews.author: Charmaine

customer_reviews.title: A must have for newborns
customer_reviews.text: Let me start off by saying who has time to wait hours for the warmer to warm up a wipe? No one. I took a cup of hot water and poured it over the wipes and voila! Warm wipes right away, every time I put in a new pack I repeat this process and the warmer does a great job of keeping them warm. It's easy to clean, no mold build up at all- a must have for newborns. Although I must say I don't see any way this device could ever warm up by itself. It should include instructions of soaking the sponge in hot water to speed up the process.
customer_reviews.author: Blanco Castro

customer_reviews.title: Great but needs constant dispenser reloading.
customer_reviews.text: I do enjoy having warm wipes for my baby. He’s a lot less fussy when changing him during the nights. I do wish it was bigger, but it does hold a good amount. I just have to break up my large packs of wipes I have. And the dispenser always drops the wipes and I have to open and fix it. That is the biggest issue, is having to reload the dispenser because it doesn’t hold the wipes that great. And it kind of stinks when having to do it while trying to hurry in the middle of the night to grab a quick wipe. Other than that it is a nice little gadget.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolute junk. But something else.
customer_reviews.text: We purchased 2 of these as replacements for a different brand that we had for 2 years. Bought them because they were reviewed well & Amazon recommended. The best I can say is: they aren’t refrigerating the wipes! They don’t keep the wipes warm at all. The pop up top is about useless. None of the wipes work well in the feeding system & we just keep having to open the entire lid each time we need a wipe. Don’t waste your money. But something that works.
customer_reviews.author: A. Woland

customer_reviews.title: Trouble with both lids
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of this wipe warmer in December 2018. One for my son’s new baby and another for my face wipes. The lid on mine never closed tight and I should have returned it, but didn’t. My son just started having trouble with the part of the lid where you pull the wipes from. It doesn’t want to stay closed, so he puts something heavy on top to keep it closed. The heating unit still works, so there’s at least that.
customer_reviews.author: DMak

customer_reviews.title: Good value, glad I bought it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my father, who has dementia. It keeps the wipes not cold. It's not exactly warm, and it's a definite improvement over the shock and discomfort of cold wipes. It did slightly melt the "pillow" in the bottom at first. There were brown, melted stripes on each end, underneath, against the bottom of the compartment. The pillow was slightly stuck where it was melted. Despite this, I'm happy with this and I'm very glad I decided to get it! I also think it's a good value for the price
customer_reviews.author: palisade73

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described!!
customer_reviews.text: Not much to report on this one. It was exactly what the Mother was looking for. When my children were younger we could find them everywhere and now we can't find them anywhere. My best friend just had a baby and text me asking if I had one I wasn't using. I told her no but to give me a second and ordered this one in a hurry. ;) She said it's working great and she likes that it holds any brand of wipes. It keeps them the right temp for the baby and she couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Westberry

customer_reviews.title: A must buy for kids
customer_reviews.text: At times the wipes feels too cold to handle, so I can't imagine what kid might feel. A friend suggested us to buy this and we are so thankful for the suggestion. In terms of handling, we need to refill water every few days to keep wipes warm.
customer_reviews.author: R3

customer_reviews.title: I won't dispense consistently...
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this based on the reviews. Yes it warms up nicely, yes it keeps tissues moist, yes it is easy to load. But all this has not any value if the tissues won't dispense consistently. I am using water wipes, which are very common these days, I tried with different amounts of wipes, pulling slow, pulling fast, etc but after a few wipes it stops dispensing. Sending this back as it really does not work as it should.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Britto

customer_reviews.title: cloth wipes for my cloth diapers
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this because my 7 month old is now transitioning into solids and the cloth diaper journey is now getting serious.... so I researched and decided to invest in a wipe warmer so that I can keep the cloth wipes moist and ready for use,...so far only the bottom wipes are truly warm,... but still a good solution for me,.. previously I had dry wipes and a spray bottle,.. its just too much of a hassle,.. so even though these aren't that warm, they are moist and above room temp.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: This wipe warmer has been a total life saver. My baby boy hated diaper changes because of the cold wipes. I decided to just buy a nice looking, cheap wipe warmer to help the poor guy out. You really can't beat this warmer for the price! It keeps the wipes at the perfect temperature once they get warmed up, and the sponge part that stays in the bottom keeps them from getting dried out. Although I bought this for my own baby, this would make an awesome baby shower gift!
customer_reviews.author: Meleah Blankenship

customer_reviews.title: Lid doesn’t stay shut
customer_reviews.text: The first few times I used this warmer it was okay, nothing to brag about. It didn’t keep the wipes that warm, but the main problem was the locking mechanism on top that keeps the lid shut. It doesn’t work half the time so it won’t keep the wipes warm!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jeremiah Austin

customer_reviews.title: NOPE.
customer_reviews.text: Does not keep the wipes warm! Hard to open the top and wipes get stuck in dispenser. Also, there is a foam pad that goes inside and under wipes that has to be soaked with water every few days and placed in wipe warmer. If you don't, the wipes dry up. THIS IS A HUGE HASSLE. Had I known I wouldn't have bought this. I would return it but we unfortunately threw the box away. DON'T WASTE YOUR MONEY.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. A

customer_reviews.title: Use with Sam's Club or Pampers wipes
customer_reviews.text: Works as described. Some wipes are hard to get through the hole but the Sam's Club packs work well. It does take a while to warm the wipes, but my son never minded the cold wipes so I'm not sure it was a necessary purchase. We keep it on his changing table as a place to hold the wipes for easy access. I re-wet the pillow when it comes to the end of the pack but I don't think my husband does when he's the last one to use it and it still works fine for us.
customer_reviews.author: Erica W.

customer_reviews.title: It's lid lock not good.
customer_reviews.text: It's working good but it's cover lock stop working after few days because of that wipes started drying. It's lock quality not too good. I have to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Jagjit Singh

customer_reviews.title: Antimicrobial Properties
customer_reviews.text: This is the first wipe warmer I bought after having two babies, so I regret not having bought it before. Now my baby boy doesn’t wake up at night even if I change his diaper. This has been one of my best purchases!!! Believe me, I’m a picky customer and I’m very satisfied with this product. Before buying it, I did a research about wipe warmers. This is what I found and convinced me to buy this wipe warmer. “It has been EPA approved and the addition of antimicrobial properties will keep any bacteria from setting in and growing on your wipes.” I highly recommend it!!!
customer_reviews.author: colvera

customer_reviews.title: warms wipes just enough for comfort
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a gift and gifted one for the grandparents. I like how it warms but I feel you need to moisten the pad weekly. For some reason my warmer's lid will not stay closed. The common issue I have with my warmer as well as the grandparents warmer is that the wipes do not dispense well - meaning once you pull one out the next one does not follow. It's kinda annoying, but its not a deal breaker. We use the same wipes so maybe a different wipe could make the difference.
customer_reviews.author: Kara Kaumeyer

customer_reviews.title: More upkeep than some, but keeps wipes warm and moist.
customer_reviews.text: I like the diaper warmer. I would not have purchased if I knew I had to wet the pad with every refill. I didn't read well enough, I suppose. The product has stood up over the past month. The nightlight is just right, my 16 month old can't figure out how to unlock it to get to get coveted wipes hehe, and it is affordable. I'm not looking forward to purchasing refill pads though.
customer_reviews.author: Kristy A.

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this!!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for new newborn which now made a month old today thinking it was the same quality back like 9 years ago with my first born, which I was totally wrong. Back then I swore by this it worked so good now it’s sucks. My new born cries every time because it doesn’t heat the wipes up! I don’t know if mine came out defective but waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: Phuong Dao

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: This is an okay whipe warmer. I dislike the fact that we have to purchase a new wet pillow for it every three months and you MUST keep it moist at all times or else it’ll burn and turn brownish and hard. We wet the whipe pillow once a week. I didn’t think a wet pillow would come with a whipe warmer being that this is my first anyways. The whipes tend to get cool really fast once removed from the warmer so be sure to use right away! After two weeks of using, the top no longer closes. It’s clean looking but it’s definitely not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: S. Evans

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 4 months.
customer_reviews.text: It was a great product for the first 4 months and then the locking component broke. I mean, c’mon, it’s a wipe dispenser. That mechanism should be built for repeated use. You cannot have something where you need 2 hands to open it in the middle of changing your baby. I ended up deciding to just unplug it and I’ll throw it away. Such a bummer.
customer_reviews.author: Salemite

customer_reviews.title: Horrible product burned the sponge - have to throw it all away
customer_reviews.text: 4-17-20 I went to use the wipes and they were completely dry the sponge is smelly and completely burned I have plenty of pics to show the dry wipes and burned sponge and burn marks on the wipe holder. Horrible product. During this quarantine it is not the time to be wasteful of 64 wipes for my baby. Wish I wouldnt have selected this product. PREVIOUS 3-2020 Review Placed- Only replaced the wipes twice and when I went to soak sponge between the replenishing the wipes as instructed was stuck on the bottum and seems to have burn marks.
customer_reviews.author: michael figuera

customer_reviews.title: GreAt product!! Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Great gift! Works well. Doesn’t have an on/off power button but easily unplugs if needed to. Warms good enough, and fits a large amount of wipes. The night light is very dim so I never relied on it but overall great product
customer_reviews.author: amaru82

customer_reviews.title: Latch stopped working after 1week
customer_reviews.text: The latch on ours stopped working. It won't stay closed and thus dries out the Wipes very quickly. Eventually gave up and just taped the dispensing top and have to open the loading top every time I have to use it. Not very convenient. Keep in mind that you also have to continue to purchase the little pad used to keep Wipes moist. With cold months up ahead need another unit and I will NOT be purchasing this one again.
customer_reviews.author: LOURDES LÓPEZ

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: We had a different Prince Lionheart wipes warmer that didn’t snap/lock close and the wipes dried out so quickly even with the everfresh pillows in the lid and under the wipes. This one is $10 cheaper than the other one and is much better. The wipes stay moist and warm since it snaps closed where you refill the wipes and where you open it to pull one out.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality.
customer_reviews.text: I had this same warmer seven years ago with my first born, so I knew I wanted it again for my newest baby. The product is such poor quality now. Wipes are not warm- AT ALL. The whole refill lid comes open every time you pull a wipe through. Very disappointed. Will be returning. Don’t bother to waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Grizzle

customer_reviews.title: great wipe warmer
customer_reviews.text: my spoil my baby daughter and she loves a warm wet wipe. i didnt think i needed it, but after being discharged from the hospital and the nurses taught me to run warm water on the wipes. i love this unit but the pillow needs water after each refill of wet wipes and like everyone complaint here is the top lid keeps popping open. even when the wipes are not sticking out. i got fed up and ripped that rubber pusher out and its been working great so far. i just need to remind my wife to close the lid or it wont warm the wipes at all
customer_reviews.author: fondoo_usa

customer_reviews.title: Not even room temperature
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like these. I was so excited to plug it in and try it out. My baby boy would jump every time I changed him because of the coldness of the wipes. I was hoping this to be the solution but this warmer did even warm the wipes to room temp. My wipes are still cold. My daughter already tossed the box so.... guess I am out the money!
customer_reviews.author: Saundra Smyrski

customer_reviews.title: Lid will not stay closed.
customer_reviews.text: Terrible product - I’ve been using this for only two months and as of a few weeks ago, the lid won’t stay shut anymore, so the top half of the top wipe is getting dried out. I resorted to using packing tape to try to force the lid closed. I will be returning this and searching for a superior wipes warmer.
customer_reviews.author: H. Lucero

customer_reviews.title: Nicely warm wipes
customer_reviews.text: All wipe warmers are made the way so it’s hard to yes it’s own opening and thread th wipes through it. I already knew it so not upset. I was just looking for something not too expensive to warm my wipes. I do not believe it’s a luxory to make your wipes warm- try using a cold one on a winter night on your baby’s bottom and you will see. My machine works well thus far for 3 months. Got second one for my parents house.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is our second one of these. The first ...
customer_reviews.text: This is our second one of these. The first ones lid would keep popping up after just one month of use. The second one however is still going strong 10 months later. The heating element is just right and keeps wipes warm and cozy for baby. The look and design is high quality and doesn’t look cheap in our nursery at all.
customer_reviews.author: Matt & Kristen

customer_reviews.title: This thing sucks.
customer_reviews.text: The latch that closes the top broke after just a month of owning it. This now just lets out heat/moisture - We can set a heavy object on top to fix for now. Also the way the wipes come out, typically one tears off, but then the rest of it falls back in, causing you now to open the whole thing one handed (Because you have a baby with a dirty diaper in your other hand) and then try to whip out torn baby wipes. Every change I cuss at this thing. Support said they are sending new latch - that was a week ago. Throw this thing away.
customer_reviews.author: TCB

customer_reviews.title: Better than any other warmer, solves all the issues!
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 kids, and have used the Muchkin warmer, but it broke and we replaced with this. WOWZA! It solves all the issues, keeps each wipe the same level of moisture (not dry on top of the stack and soggy on the bottom like the muchkin). It's a nice amount of warm and easy to use, and doesn't look awful with bright colors. It's the perfect warmer, and my kids miss it when we travel. Keeps my newborn calm through midnight changes, instead of being woken with big cold wipe on the butt.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew K.

customer_reviews.title: Mommy of five, finally purchased one! And yes, worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Many had discouraged me about how a wipe warmer wasn’t used or with it. I still went for it! Due to knowing that I always body heated the wipes first, especially with days old newborn. I’m so glad I purchased the warmer. I’m a mom to now five kids, and this is truly so handy! It’s made those exhausting late night changes easier.
customer_reviews.author: 208me

customer_reviews.title: Wipes don’t pull through properly
customer_reviews.text: Wipes don’t stay pulled through the opening so I’m constantly having to open the lower chamber and pull the wipes up through. Also, the warmer only holds 30 wipes (which is nothing when you’re caring for a newborn) so you have to refill often or overfill in which case the wipes aren’t warm.
customer_reviews.author: Cassie Y

customer_reviews.title: Added comfort for baby’s bum
customer_reviews.text: My infant son was born in January and he absolutely HATED middle-of-the-night diaper changes! When that chilly wipe would touch his skin he screamed. I also noticed his sensitive skin was becoming more irritated by the chilly wipes. This wipe warmer has calmed my little boys screams because now there is no shock of a cold wipe during diaper changes. Sure, he’s still not a fan of mid-night diaper changes, but they are much less startling. The warm wipe provides a slight calming effect and his sensitive skin is no longer irritated. I would 100% recommend this wipe warmer for a bit of comfort for your little one.
customer_reviews.author: Krissy B.

customer_reviews.title: Eh ok
customer_reviews.text: Eh. Hardly warms up the wipes. You have to not open it for a full 24 hours to get the warmest wipe. The light it has Is so dim, so do not rely on it as a night light. But It’s better than having the wipes in their packaging to avoid making too much noise while changing diapers at 3am.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in product quality.
customer_reviews.text: Used for several weeks and loved it, but then the top latch started to have trouble staying shut (which dried out the wipes, and caused the water to evaporate faster). After a little while using it with a book balanced on top to keep it shut, we gave up. Customer service was difficult to get a hold of and the website had a complicated process for product issues. I wouldn't but another Prince Lionheart product.
customer_reviews.author: Mondo9

customer_reviews.title: It's nice for the baby to not have super cold wipes ...
customer_reviews.text: As I was registering for my baby shower, everyone told me not to get a wipes warmer so I didn't. My husband went to a friend's house who sweared by this thing so we ordered it. It actually works well. You just add water to the wet pad inside weekly and that's about it. It warms the wipes well as in you don't have to worry about them being too warm. It's nice for the baby to not have super cold wipes rubbed on her in the middle of the night!
customer_reviews.author: Puja Katari

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: At first it didn't seem like it was warming the wipes but there longer it was on and the less full I was able to tell it was working. I don't like the fact I will have to change the pad every so often but it does it's job
customer_reviews.author: Tiff_Kat

customer_reviews.title: Not sure if worth it for the baby
customer_reviews.text: My newborn HATES getting changed and we tried everything to calm him down, including those warmers. The minute you pulled them from the box the wipes would cool off and become room temperature. Hence it did not make a difference wnd did not help. A few weeks later i gave up using them altogether and my newborn outgrew this phase and stopped crying when being changed. Bottom line: a myth that those help and a total waste.
customer_reviews.author: Sybille K

customer_reviews.title: Good, But Top Lid Does Not Stay Closed
customer_reviews.text: I like this other than the fact that the top lid does not stay closed. I bought one of these and then returned it when, after about 10 days of use, the upper lid kept popping open immediately after I pressed it closed. I thought that I had just received a lemon and that exchanging it for a new one would solve the problem. Unfortunately, the second one also stopped remaining closed after about a week of use. It's not a huge problem because I just put something else on top of the lid and get it to stay closed that way, but it's disappointing. Seems like this should be an easy design defect to fix.
customer_reviews.author: Cackin

customer_reviews.title: Costco wipes don't fit
customer_reviews.text: Decent wipe warmer but keep in mind that the Kirkland brand 100 count wipes won't fit in this. It's a pain in the ass to store opened wipes so we just buy brands that do fit in this. Otherwise a good product.
customer_reviews.author: lisam

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use and to fill with wet wipes.
customer_reviews.text: Grandbabies are SO MUCH more comfortable with a warmed wipe for diaper changes.We live in an old farm house which can get chilly at times and this wed wipe warmer is a great & welcome addition to our nursery for our Grandbabies!
customer_reviews.author: Nah Nah Patty

customer_reviews.title: Great investment
customer_reviews.text: I have two of these and completely love them. We love in a cool climate and don’t keep our home super warm during night hours. These help keep baby comfortable during night time changes and we can all get back to sleep
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette Cudworth

customer_reviews.title: I hate products that make me do more work
customer_reviews.text: I can't stand this warmer. The inner pad dries out quickly and turns it brown (forcing me to buy the $10 basket accessory). It doesn't hold enough wipes bc the basket and pad take up so much room. There isn't a window to see how many wipes are left. And I have to keep filling it with water. I hate products that make me do more work. I'm going back to the Munchin warmer I had with my first child. That one was no fuss.
customer_reviews.author: kjf

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: I love a wipes warmer as a mom of triplets it is essential for newborns born in colder months. No crying diaper changes. This is the brand I had a few years back ; not quite as warm as years ago but no dry wipes
customer_reviews.author: amazon reader

customer_reviews.title: Not warm enough for newborn bottom.
customer_reviews.text: Likes: cord location, small footprint, and flip top door. Dislikes : NOT warm enough, every time you pull a wipe it rips in half or pieces. I've bought almost every wipe warmer Amazon has to offer. They are ALL flawed in some way or another. Good luck finding one that checks all the boxes and does the rather simple task they were half way designed to do.
customer_reviews.author: JEREMY SMITH

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 2 weeks of use
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed!! We had this same warmer for my now 5 year old and it was wonderful!! We bought one for our new baby. It isn’t working. We bought it in January but baby was just born 05/28/20, and it stopped working when she was only 2 weeks old! Terrible!
customer_reviews.author: LaDonna

customer_reviews.title: Wont stay closed... constantly wasting wipes
customer_reviews.text: The first week of use this product was awesome. But then things started to go downhill. The locking mechanism stopped working more and more causing the lid to continuously pop back open. Sleep deprived from the joys of having a newborn we would forget to place a heavier object ontop and continuously wasted wipes since the top one would be dry. Then we started having a mold problem. The foam insert is easy to clean and replace but we are finding that by the end of each pack of wipes there is mold at the bottom of our wipe insert... NASTY.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Hawthorne

customer_reviews.title: Excellent warmer, but wipes don’t pull through.
customer_reviews.text: The warmer works well, been using for 1 year. It’s annoying because the wipes often don’t pop through so I need to open the lid and put another through, but it’s fine overall. You MUST re-wet the pad 1-2x a week otherwise it will dry up and you need a new replacement. I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: So glad I purchased this item. My baby gets so fussy when he is cold and in the downstairs living room, it gets a little chilly. The warmer definitely helps keep him comfortable while I change him.
customer_reviews.author: Bri

customer_reviews.title: Great product but the lid opens
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product and i ordered it because i already had 2 which i bought from our local store so i was familiar with the product and loved it.. but this one in particular the lid openes alone and the wipes tend to dry up so i have to place something on top but other than that everything else works fine
customer_reviews.author: Roxanacglz

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: I own two of these as I have two babies in diapers who sleep in different parts of the house. This warmer works great. I got lazy and started pouring water over each new package of wipes instead of taking out the antimicrobial sponge and soaking it, because that was getting messy. This is better than the hiccapop one, which I purchased and ended up returning.
customer_reviews.author: Anita

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Before I purchased thus my daughter hated getting her diaper changed because of cold baby wipes . Thank you !! I will say the little pad on the bottom that you need to get wet needs to be re moistened about every 2 days or your wipes will be dry
customer_reviews.author: Katelyn Lund

customer_reviews.title: Dry wipes and won’t pull through the top
customer_reviews.text: The wipes dried out quickly. But also the wipes won’t pull through the top. One comes out and the next one won’t.
customer_reviews.author: tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Wipes are not as warm as they should get
customer_reviews.text: It only knocks the chill off the wipes the wipes are not warmed all the way . Ive owned other wipe warmers with my previous children,and the wipes get warm. With this wipe warmer it feels as if i ran some hot water over them and let the wipe air out a little bit . Again it’s durable but the wipes are not as warm as they should get
customer_reviews.author: Lexi

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't even warm the wipes!
customer_reviews.text: I owned these 10 years ago when my kids were young. I have several in different rooms. They warmed nicely. I bought this to clean foster kitten faces after bottle feeding. This one doesn't warm at all, and the lid barely opens. Total waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: S. V.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to dispense
customer_reviews.text: Since I buy baby wipes in bulk, I realize I need this. It’s a little bulky and not lightweight. I haven’t had the chance to use the full feature. It works as my baby wipe organizer.
customer_reviews.author: Jam

customer_reviews.title: Not that warm
customer_reviews.text: I have another warmer that makes the wipes nice and warm. This one the wipe does not feel much different from a wipe out of a package sitting out at room temperature. I'm a little disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Serves its purpose
customer_reviews.text: Only had this for about a month and a half and already the part that closes does not close anymore so I have to put something on top for a min then remove it and it stays closed. Other than that it keeps the wipes warm and no longer shocks my 2 month old with cold wipes.
customer_reviews.author: Tangee

customer_reviews.title: Nice to have
customer_reviews.text: We loved this so much that we bought one for downstairs too! You do have to keep the pad wet but it's really not a hassle. Every Saturday we soak/clean the pads. We've used costco and Sam's wipes (and others I just can't remember why we got from the baby shower) and all have worked just fine. He's months and both warmers are working great And someone mentioned these were a bad idea because your child will get too used to a warm wipe. That's never been the case at all. Every time we leave the house his bum gets cold wipes and he's never griped about it.
customer_reviews.author: Tabitha Rae

customer_reviews.title: Did not get warm
customer_reviews.text: We had the other Prince Lionheart warmer without the pop top and I wish I had kept it! This one doesn’t warm the wipes hardly at all, and baby agreed. The dispensing top isn’t all that great as it makes it hard to close it back up and any part left out of the top is super cold. Definitely returning for the other!
customer_reviews.author: Kacey

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Product did not come with the pillow for wipes to stay moist. Saw this issue on another review but figured it was a one time issue, guess not. I ordered a replacement and it came the next day! That was unexpected. So far so good. Happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Stay Closed
customer_reviews.text: The lid on this does not stay closed. We returned the first one after the latch gave up after a month or so and they replaced it. Now the replacement is giving us the same issue and it's only been a few weeks this time. Defeats the whole purpose of a wipe warmer since the heat escapes when the lid is open. Not to mention it dries out your wipes!
customer_reviews.author: baronegantt

customer_reviews.title: Great for little tushies
customer_reviews.text: **edit** After a couple of months, the kid no longer stayed latched. I can wiggle and play with it to make it stay shut, but will eventually stop working. I love the fact we can keep wipes warm for our little one. I bought this based on all the great reviews and it is indeed great. I thought it would be a little warmer, but it still does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa

customer_reviews.title: Wipe warmer never warmed up
customer_reviews.text: I just received the wipe warmer today around noon. I’ve had it plugged in for over 2 hours. Green power light indicator is lit, however, 2+ hours later its still not warm. How long should it take to warm up? I am so disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Judith Rumberg

customer_reviews.title: Cute design
customer_reviews.text: I really want to love this wipe warmer but i feel like it could be better. I stalked up on the replacement pillows when i ordered this but wipes come out barely warm and turn super cold quickly. I followed the directions on taking it out weekly and making sure its wet. Hoping maybe I'll change my mind about it.
customer_reviews.author: Becky7777

customer_reviews.title: Very top lid flips open, but still good purchase.
customer_reviews.text: The one flaw of this item is that the very top lid flips open all the time, and lets the humid, hot air out - defeating the point of having it. We had to tape the top lid down, and only open the secondary lid that is used to refill. The bad thing about that is that the wipes stick together, and it's really hard to separate them while changing babies diaper with the other hand (legs/feet tend to find poo on the table if not held). But overall glad to have a wipe warmer - she screams a lot less bc they are warm and not shocking.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Schaffner

customer_reviews.title: Okay Quality.
customer_reviews.text: I know it’s not supposed to keep wipes hot, but it doesn’t warm them as much as I thought it would. I have another wipe warmer from another brand that I believe is better. However, this warmer still makes them warmer than wipes straight out of the package.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Cons

customer_reviews.title: Great But Better if Worked on Batteries!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my Mom and her only criticism is that the wipes barely get warm and it requires a plug. It would have been better if you could use batteries or once charged you didn’t need to have it plugged in. I don’t know if any bathroom with a plug near the toilet.
customer_reviews.author: K. A. Donk

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't keep the wipes warm enough
customer_reviews.text: This was nice because it was easy to use, but I didn't like that as soon as I got the wipe out of the warmer, it would cool off really fast. It ended up being the same as the room temperature wipes. I only used it for about a week.
customer_reviews.author: A Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the hassle
customer_reviews.text: This wipe warmer was more of a hassle than anything. The pillow used for holding moisture and keeping the wipes from browning dries up quickly, so I'm constantly having to rewet it or replace it. The wipes would brown anyway. If I didn't keep up with the maintenance of the pillow, I'd be left with a stack of dry wipes. I stopped using this and use their portable wipe warmer version. I find it works much better.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica S.

customer_reviews.title: It does the job
customer_reviews.text: The rubber inside makes it hard to pull wipes thru. It works well. I like it. It doesn't get too hot. The light isn't very bright.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Pass on this one
customer_reviews.text: Frustrating. This is prone to the bit of wipe that has popped through getting caught and being very difficult to open next time. Use only the thinnest of wipes. Once the wipe is out is cools in mere seconds so be warned you have a lukewarm wipe, not a warm wipe. I would return, but the puppy made off with the packaging.
customer_reviews.author: JT Bench

customer_reviews.title: Don’t put a big bag of wipes
customer_reviews.text: Now I know why tissue breaks in the middle. Don’t put full huggies big bag into it— too full. If you put a smaller bag of wipes it will work well. Also the less wipes in it the warmer it is: because it heats bottom up.
customer_reviews.author: carol

customer_reviews.title: Lock is wonky but not impossible
customer_reviews.text: Lock is wonky but otherwise works great. Easy fix, company- please take care of it. I gave it the full five stars because I just flip it closed with my fingernail every time. Great for cloth wipes.
customer_reviews.author: Bren S.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: Not warm at all! Idk if my item is defective or what, but it is not warm and my wipes have dried out. Will be getting a munchkin wipe warmer, got it with my last baby and they actually keep them warm unlike these.
customer_reviews.author: Aisha

customer_reviews.title: Missing the night light
customer_reviews.text: The product is fine for it’s purpose but couple things to consider before buying, first, i buy wipes that come 100 in a package and so when I refill it, the wipe holder does not close fully therefore wipes are cold on top. Second, after I received it I realized that this one does not have a night light on top of it... my previous one that broke and needed replacing, had it, which I found extremely useful when changing a baby at night
customer_reviews.author: Lijana Vitaite

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: Love this but hate that i have to remember to keep the padding moist, or else it will dry out the wipes. other than that it works great
customer_reviews.author: deanna

customer_reviews.title: Gift for a friend
customer_reviews.text: Our friends loved this product. Kind of a hassle to use it as you have to prep for some time but it was a useful and we could stay within our budget.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonshoper

customer_reviews.title: It does the job!
customer_reviews.text: It does do an excellent job keeping the whiles warm. I have to open it up completely to get the whipped out bc the slit part makes it impossible to pull out. You have to remember to wet the white cushion or all the whipes will dry out. But overall I do like it worth the value!
customer_reviews.author: BadAssPanda

customer_reviews.title: Best Invention Ever
customer_reviews.text: when you have a fussy or crying baby and you add to it by putting a cold wipe on their bum, it is not pretty. The wipe warmer is great (& not just for baby). It helps to soothe her during diaper changes. Not to hot, its just enough to take the chill off of the wipe with a little warmth.
customer_reviews.author: Djax12

customer_reviews.title: Had older version had to buy new one so hopefully...
customer_reviews.text: I got this to replace a old one we had that was very similar. The old one was great, didn't brown or dry out the wipes, and didn't hear them up to hot either. Hopefully this one is the same.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Keeps things looking organized.
customer_reviews.text: A wipes warmer was something I thought was totally ridiculous when we were first looking at things for the baby. It just seemed like something stupid that people would think they need, just because it's in all the stores. Then we had our baby, in cold November, and the wipes just seemed like they were so cold on his little butt and I realized there's nothing wrong with pampering baby with some unnecessary luxuries here and there! It also keeps our changing station so nice-looking and organized that we just unplug it in the summer and keep it using it. Just keep refills nearby so you don't have to step away to refill the thing when it empties.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie McCloud

customer_reviews.title: Warm wipes = happy baby-changing time
customer_reviews.text: I love this wipes warmer almost as much as my baby does. Besides knowing that a warm wipe on the nether parts is far more comfortable and less shocking than a cold wipe, they are easy to refill and the unit warms evenly. There are refillable pads that go underneath the wipes to keep in moisture, just be sure to re-wet the pad whenever you refill the warmer with new wipes. The refills are easy to find at Babies r us or online.
customer_reviews.author: Aiundria

customer_reviews.title: Keeps wipes warm for a happy baby bottom.
customer_reviews.text: One of the best things you can get to make diaper changes more pleasant for your child. Holds most packages of wipes but it won’t fit a full pack of Costco wipes so I put the extra in a ziplock until it gets low again. If there is a XL one I would recommend that if you buy Costco wipes.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: So, you gotta buy inserts to use for it. Works well until the top lid where wipes come out won’t stay closed. Irritating but I don’t think it effects the sipes too much. Does the job though. Easy to open main compartment. I do that a lot because if you use water wipes they don’t pull through.
customer_reviews.author: Heather M

customer_reviews.title: Do not waste your money..
customer_reviews.text: Waste of money... This is useless product, it barely warms the wipes, the wipes are already cold by the time you pull them out... No use..
customer_reviews.author: Sujan Gautam

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I read all the reviews before purchasing this item. Now that I have used this warmer for 3 months I can't figure out why the issues. The issue of the wipes drying out is easy...just only put in half of the refill at a time. I put the remaining wipes in a zip lock bag until ready to use. Problem solved and simple. The issue of the little pad drying out at the bottom. Easy just follow the instructions and wet it often. Easy! This is a really great product and great for babies that would rather not have a cold wet wipe hit them just as they are waking up or anytime during the day. I highly recommed.
customer_reviews.author: tinarie

customer_reviews.title: So happy I bought this
customer_reviews.text: I have to admit that I bought this wipe warmer for my sick ferrets. Who wants a cold wipey used on your bum? Not them. Kept the wipes warm and damp. Perfect for pet or child. Love this!!
customer_reviews.author: Tam

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Packaging But won't stay closed
customer_reviews.text: They really took their time with the packaging it looks great. But after a week I couldn't get the lid to stay shut. Hopefully mine is a 1 off but its pretty annoying to have to tape it shut. Especially since the wipes are warm for 2 seconds after pulling them out then they cool off quick.
customer_reviews.author: Kristopher Hicks

customer_reviews.title: Defective product, no response from the mfr.
customer_reviews.text: Keeps the wipes wet and warm however, I think I got a defective product as the lid will not stay closed on its own. UPDATE: We've been using this wipe warmer for almost a year now. It has continued to keep the wipes warm HOWEVER, we're still holding the lid down with a tub of Vaseline because it NEVER latched closed properly from day one. AND the little foam pad that's supposed to keep things moist has now turned brown and crusty in some spots even though it's never sat empty without moist wipes in it.
customer_reviews.author: Christine D.

product_meta.title: Prince Lionheart Ultimate Wipes Warmer with an Integrated Nightlight |Pop-Up Wipe Access. All Time Worldwide #1 Selling Wipes Warmer. It Comes with an everFRESH Pillow System That Prevent Dry Out.
product_meta.description:
The ultimate wipesWARMER by Prince Lionheart is the number one selling wipes warmer worldwide. Prince Lionheart wipes warmers all feature the patented Ever-Fresh® System which is guaranteed to help keep your wipes the freshest they can be to soothe Baby's delicate skin. The patented Ever-Fresh System works three ways: 1) Anti-microbial: Both the wipe warmer’s tub and the Ever-Fresh pillow are treated with an EPA approved additive to inhibit the growth of microorganisms that may cause spoilage, odors and mildew. 2) Non-browning: Keeping wipes moist prevents most discoloration from occurring when wipes are warmed. Over time, additives typically found in baby wipes, cause discoloration as they warm. The Ever-Fresh System effectively insulates wipes from the warming surface, preventing browning. 3) Moisture Retention: The Ever-Fresh System keeps wipes moist by an evaporation and condensation process. Micro pores in the pillow trap and release water as needed to maintain moisture content. Ideal for use on Oily or Combination skin

BRAND STORY
By
feature_bullets: We made the first appliance style wipesWARMER in 1996 and we’ve been warming bottoms ever since
Only wipes warmer in the market feature the patented everFRESH Pillow System to prevent wipes from dry-out and browning due to the heat.
Soft night light for sleepy 3am changes. Safe and efficient low voltage system with AC/DC adapter.
Pairs with the Prince Lionheart diaperDEPOTs
Keeps baby wipes fresh, moist and free from discoloration

specifications.Material Type: No lead, PVC, phthalates, Triclosan or Triclocarban
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars4,413 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
